case.state: Where am I? I have watched over all Erinn and never have I seen this place.
What is this device? I have never seen its like.
If I may ask, ~name~, what manner of creature are you? Never before have I seen your like.
'Tis an honor to meet other deities! From whence do You hail?
Jolyne? There is some manner of spirit behind you?
Hello, butterfly!
Where am I? And... A Wisp? Can Wisps play cards?
You wish to play a game? Very well! I have not walked among mortals in too long.
Perhaps ~cards~ would be best?
I do not know this game, but perhaps ~cards~?
I believe I will try exchanging ~cards~.
~cards~, if you would?
May I ask for ~cards~?
Perhaps ~cards~ would serve Me well...
May I have ~cards~?
I would like ~cards~!
I shall change ~cards~.
I believe I shall change ~cards~.
Perhaps ~cards~ is the right choice here...
I would like ~cards~, if you would?
These look promising.
I feel confident about these cards.
A good start!
I think I may be getting the hang of this!
Yes, yes, very good.
These seem quite promising.
A welcome sight!
Will these be My comeback?
I have hope in these cards.
I am not defeated yet!
And so, the sun shall rise again!
A sight for sore eyes!
What do these cards portend? I have not played a card game in quite a long time.
I believe I can work with these.
Which hand was this again?
I believe I can work with these.
'Tis all up to fate.
Who can say what shall come of these?
All that remains is to cast the dice of fate.
Not perfect, but that makes the game all the more thrilling!
I shall see what comes of it.
The anticipation is thrilling!
I have done what I can. All that remains is to wait.
It all comes down to this.
What are the hands in this game, again?
I do not like the look of this...
So, this was...
These seem ill-omened.
I do not see a pattern here...
Well, there is nothing to be done about it now.
Well, there is no changing the past.
I wonder if I can win with these?
These are foreboding...
This may be My last hand, but 'tis not a bitter game to lose...
Not what I was hoping for, but there is nothing to do about it.
I did all I could. Now, My fate is out of My hands.
In truth, I simply found Myself here and decided to join a game.
I am most familiar with the hymns of My priests, but never before have I heard music I did not take joy in.
I have two younger siblings whom I love dearly. Twins named Hymerark and Jeamiderark.
My name simply means "god of life".
The Tuatha simply call their coins gold, and the Milletians seem to have followed in their footsteps. Those among the Fomors with the intelligence to trade use coins called ducats.
Cairbre is the greatest singer among the gods. My talents lie with the harp.
My medallion is precious beyond words to Me. 'Twas a gift from My father.
I love every season, but summer will always have a special place in My heart.
A simple question, really. My color is gold!
My sister Hymerark stole My harp once. That was an odd day, but looking back I cannot help but laugh.
I sometimes fence with My sister Hymerark. Jeamiderark was never particularly interested in joining us, though.
The life force of all things? I know it well! 'Tis called Erg where I hail from, and spreading it over the world is My task.
Come to think of it, have I ever seen Hymerark and Jeamiderark apart from one another?
In Erinn, 'tis very common that the greatest fighters take the forms of children.
...some things are tragic necessities.
I hope that My siblings are doing alright, ensuring that things stay in order while I am away.
Let us see if I remember... The hands in poker are ranked as follows...
I hope that these cards will see Me through.
How is everyone faring?
I hope everyone is enjoying the game as much as I am!
Oh, is it My turn?
Very well!
Well done! I had thought I was getting ahead.
So the hands are ranked in this order... oh, 'tis My turn.
Well done! I congratulate your victory.
So 'tis My turn to strip now?
I seem to be getting off to a poor start...
I am impressed! You have been playing quite well.
You have beaten Me fairly and I accept My loss.
Undressing shall be much easier if I first remove My comb.
I ask of you, be careful with My medallion.
I only have one choice left.
My crown seems the logical choice.
My sash next...
Luckily these shoes are not difficult to remove.
I must beg your patience for a moment. This robe is a bit tricky.
Ah! Shaking out My hair is quite satisfying.
Mortals say crowns are the ornament of kings. I wonder why they were the garment chosen for such an honor...
Had I known I would find this place, I would have worn a robe that fastens in front!

Why is it that mortals are so often ashamed of their own bodies? I have never been able to understand why the raw life force is so often shunned. Being Aton Cimeni's son does not grant Me His omniscience.
'Tis a pleasant thing, to feel the earth beneath My feet.
The robe does seem to fall rather differently without it.
'Twas a gift from My father, Aton Cimeni. To lose it would be a great sorrow.
~name~! It has been too long since I have walked Erinn. How fares the mortal coil?
Well, ~name~? Are you ready?
Whose hand is lowest? Oh, 'tis ~name~.
Are you ready, ~name~?
'Tis ~name~'s turn, then?
~name~! Are you ready?
And now...
Accept your defeat with honor and rise again stronger!
Well? Whenever you are ready.
(He seems distracted.)
Greetings... Virgo, was it?
~name~! It has been too long since I have walked Erinn. How fares the mortal coil?
(I think you broke Him, Streaming-chan.)
Well, I do like horses. They are majestic animals.
Well, ~name~? Are you ready?
Whose hand is lowest? Oh, 'tis ~name~.
Are you ready, ~name~?
'Tis ~name~'s turn, then?
~name~! Are you ready?
And now...
(He seems distracted.)
Accept your defeat with honor and rise again stronger!
Well? Whenever you are ready.
A portable card table? It certainly seems quite convenient for passing the time while traveling.
It seems a wise choice, in the beginning.
Well played!
What are you choosing? Ah, I see.
Well done. Holding on to small items is an achievement.
Ah, I see your logic.
A good choice.
I have fallen behind, have I not?
You still had...
How did you still have that?
Well, the night is young!
Is everyone ready?
'Tis a good game!
Shall we play on?
Will you continue doing so well?
The night is young, and the game goes on!
I shall have to step up My game.
I shall not give up now!
In any case, well played.
Florina?
You are a shapeshifter, then? I did not know that shapeshifters could take butterfly form.
I understand, Weiss. Long hair is a task to maintain.
It seems a wise choice, in the beginning.
Well played!
What are you choosing? Ah, I see.
Well done. Holding on to small items is an achievement.
Ah, I see your logic.
A good choice.
I have fallen behind, have I not?
You still had...
How did you still have that?
Well, the night is young!
Is everyone ready?
'Tis a good game!
Shall we play on?
Will you continue doing so well?
The night is young, and the game goes on!
I shall have to step up My game.
I shall not give up now!
In any case, well played.
A wise enough choice.
I would do the same, I think.
Right. No need to rush.
Well played!
You have done well.
'Tis no great loss.
You have played quite well.
I am impressed that you still have small items to spare.
I am impressed by your skill!
Let us play on! This is only the beginning.
Why delay? Let us begin the next round!
Is everyone ready to go on?
Is everyone ready to continue?
I am ready to play on when you are.
Let us see what the next round shall bring!
I cannot lose focus now!
This is quite enjoyable!
Well done, ~name~!
A monkey? I am familiar with shapeshifters, but not with those who take the form of a monkey.
A wise enough choice.
I would do the same, I think.
Right. No need to rush.
Well played!
You have done well.
'Tis no great loss.
You have played quite well.
I am impressed that you still have small items to spare.
I am impressed by your skill!
How did you paint your face so swiftly?
Sayaka? Is that some manner of Fomor behind you?
(Kyoko...)
(Kyoko...)
Let us play on! This is only the beginning.
Why delay? Let us begin the next round!
Is everyone ready to go on?
Is everyone ready to continue?
I am ready to play on when you are.
Let us see what the next round shall bring!
I cannot lose focus now!
This is quite enjoyable!
Well done, ~name~!
This game has gone faster than I have realized.
Already?
So soon?
Accept your defeat with honor, ~name~, and your spirit shall take a victory.
'Tis time, ~name~.
Well, ~name~? Are you ready?
How are you faring, ~name~?
~name~? Do you need a moment?
~name~'s turn... Then...
Are you ready to carry on?
The game is not yet over.
You can still win this, ~name~!
Shall we?
On with the game!
Shall we carry on now?
Do not lose hope now!
The game is not yet over!
(Lymilark is distracted by something.)
Hm?
I applaud your determination!
I see your logic, Koriand'r.
This game has gone faster than I have realized.
Already?
So soon?
Accept your defeat with honor, ~name~, and your spirit shall take a victory.
'Tis time, ~name~.
Well, ~name~? Are you ready?
How are you faring, ~name~?
~name~? Do you need a moment?
~name~'s turn... Then...
(Yuri...)
Scars mean you survived, Misato.
If it is any consolation, you wear the scar well.
I would call that unfair, but it hardly seems fair to only have two things to remove either.
Are you ready to carry on?
The game is not yet over.
You can still win this, ~name~!
Shall we?
On with the game!
Shall we carry on now?
Do not lose hope now!
The game is not yet over!
(Lymilark is distracted by something.)
Are you ready, ~name~?
~name~? Whenever you are ready.
Have courage, ~name~.
The time has come, ~name~.
Have courage.
So, 'tis ~name~'s turn...
Then, you will...
'Tis your turn, ~name~, and...
...I cannot lie. I look forward to this.
Merlin? That does not look comfortable...
You have played well, ~name~. Do not falter now!
~name~, you are quite handsome.
Do not give up!
Any lover of yours is lucky to hold your heart, handsome ~name~.
A pleasant sight indeed!
The mortal form has always held a certain fascination to me.
'Tis a lovely sight indeed.
A welcome sight to behold...
(He seems a little tongue-tied.)
Fear not, ~name~. I am at your side.
~name~? Are you ready?
If 'tis ~name~'s turn now...
You have played well. Will your courage match your skill?
Do not falter now, ~name~!
Do not falter!
'Tis time, ~name~. Whenever you are ready.
Do not falter.
(I wonder...)
Fear not the stings of others' judgment, ~name~. In My eyes, you are radiant with beauty.
Do as you wish, Arash.
Mortals are fascinating creatures, are they not?
If My memory has not failed me, this is fairly typical?
You have not lost yet, ~name~!
If I recall well, it seems a happy medium of proportion.
Pardon My staring. The mortal form has always intrigued Me deeply.
Do not give up!
Do not give up now, ~name~! You have not yet lost.
Pardon My staring, ~name~. I have always been fascinated by mortals.
You are handsome, ~name~.
(Congratulations, ~name~, you blue-screened a god.)
May it always be a joy to you, and never a burden.
Is that typical?
An intriguing sight!
You bear an uncommonly mighty virility, ~name~.
You still have a chance to win, ~name~!
You are handsome!
'Tis a surprise to see, but a pleasant one to be sure.
To see this...
Then I wish you well, Polina!
Do you need any help?
The time has come, ~name~. Are you ready?
~name~? Whenever you are ready.
Do not falter now, ~name~! You have not yet lost.
You are not yet defeated, ~name~. Remember that.
Have courage.
Are you ready?
('Tis ~name~'s turn... And then...)
(So, now...)
I cannot lie, I have awaited this eagerly.
Fear not the stings of others' judgment, ~name~. In My eyes, you are radiant with beauty.
You are fair to be seen, ~name~. Do not give up!
Now is not the time to falter!
You are beautiful, ~name~.
Your beauty and courage fill My heart with pride.
Pardon My staring. I have always been fascinated by mortals.
You have nothing to be ashamed of.
I give you my blessing, fair ~name~. Draw courage from it.
You have nothing to be ashamed of!
(Congratulations, ~name~, you broke Lymilark.)
May they always be a joy to you, and never a burden.
May they never be a burden to you!
If My memory does not fail Me, you are... above average?
You are radiant, ~name~!
Take pride in your beauty.
A sight to remember.
Mortals have always fascinated Me!
(I cannot look away...)
(I need something suitably dignified to say, and swiftly...) 'Tis said a full bosom holds a loving heart, ~name~...
Sayaka! The strange creature is back!
I give you courage's blessing, ~name~. You need not tremble at unveiling your beauty.
Fear not.
Whenever you are ready.
Do not lose hope now, ~name~! You are still in the game.
Now is not the time to falter!
Do not falter now!
(I wonder...)
(She will...)
(And now...)
What in the world was that power?
What in the world was that power?
I shall never tire of the beauty of the mortal form.
Pardon My staring. I have always been fascinated by the mortal form.
Mortals are beautiful creatures!
Any lover of yours is lucky to hold your heart, fair ~name~.
Take pride in your beauty.
You are fair to be seen.
(I am unused to going about incarnate... I had forgotten the ways this body reacts...)
(She is...)
(He's lost in thought.)
~name~? 'Tis odd to see one such as you in a place such as this.
~name~? I did not expect to meet your like here.
~name~? You do not seem the type to come to this place...
Your lack of fear gives Me joy, ~name~.
'Tis a joy to find one who has no need for shame.
The offer does interest Me, Misato. I have never before tasted strong drink other than wine.
(I do hope she is alright.)
I see. Rest assured, I shall speak of you however you wish Me to.
You have played well, ~name~. Now, enjoy yourself.
It gladdens My heart to see My beloved mortals in bliss.
'Tis a beautiful thing, primal ecstasy is!
(I must focus...)
You are not alone in this.
Breathe deep. Lose yourself. I wish you happiness.
'Tis not a sight I see often. I do not like to pry. Witnessing it now is a delight beyond measure.
I take pride in My station as god of life. To see My gifts bring bliss? 'Tis a wondrous thing.
'Tis a camaraderie in it, an odd one but a pleasant one.
May you find bliss.
You seem happy, ~name~.
May you find bliss.
I rather enjoy wagering contests of daring. Perhaps the other gods would enjoy a game akin to this? Though perhaps with different stakes, they are family after all.
Your joy invigorates Me, ~name~.
(Back and forth, back and forth... The motion is almost hypnotizing.)
To see My charges happy is...
('Tis distracting...)
I wish you joy.
(Mortals are fascinating...)
(My mind is wandering...)
(I cannot look away...)
(I can feel My own pulse...)
This is pleasant, is it not?
May I ask for advice in this?
Share in the light...
I. Suppose I cannot object.
How was it?
You wear bliss well, ~name~.
To see My gifts bring such joy...
To see bliss written on your face...
(Just stay focused...)
Oh, hello there.
You played well, ~name~. May you find joy.
(Mortals intrigue me so greatly...)
To witness your bliss... I am glad of the opportunity more than I can say.
You are not alone in this.
(Focus...)
(That looks... Quite comfortable.)
I have... Never seen such magic before.
Breathe deep. Close your eyes. Simply allow it all to wash over you.
That is the manner you favor? It seems a pleasant one.
Can you feel the life force burning in your veins?
To share in this... I am honored.
(He's completely distracted.)
I see Mana glinting in your eye...
Does it feel good?
Chase your bliss!
(In and out, in and out... 'Tis almost hypnotizing.)
I can almost feel the Mana in your veins...
(Mortals are wondrous creatures.)
I hope, sincerely, that you are enjoying this.
(My attention is drawn...)
To see mortals draw such joy from the life force...
This is pleasant, is it not?
Drink deep of the light...
To share in this...
(Pull Yourself together, Lymilark!)
(An entrancing sight...)
(I need to focus...)
You are forgiven, Tomoko. Go and sin no more... I apologize, I could not resist that one. But the sentiment remains.
How was it?
You wear bliss well, ~name~.
To see My gifts bring such joy...
(Just stay focused...)
To see bliss written on your face...
'Tis My forfeit, then? Very well. I applaud your victory.
'Tis My forfeit, then? Very well. I applaud your victory.
I have never done this incarnate before. I wonder if it will feel any different?
Hmm...
I feel Erg, pure life force, flowing in My veins.
No, that does not work...
Ahh. This is pleasant.
To an immortal god, true novelty is more precious than all the treasures of the world.
If I do this...
I am glad I found this place!
(He seems intensely focused.)
This is the pleasure mortals draw from My light? 'Tis a thing to swell a heart with pride!
There is a deep rightness to this feeling.
By My father...
Sunlight burns in My blood...
This is...
Dul Dau Wierim Savie!
This has been a wonderful night.
Mmh... Do mortals grow weary after their bliss?
This has been a wonderful night!
I may have to return to this place.
I am glad to have played with all of you!
I thank you for the game, and I wish you well.
I have not enjoyed myself this much in years. You have My gratitude and My blessings.
Where has the time gone?
(He's lost in thought.)
I thank you for the game, and I give you all My blessing. 'Twas an enlightening and enjoyable night.
